PCIeContoller2Config.help_text: This setting controls PCIe Port configurations for PCIe Controller 2. For further details see Canonlake H / LP Platform Controller Hub EDS.

PCIeContoller3Config.label: PCIe Controller 3 (Port 9-12)
PCIeContoller3Config.help_text: This setting controls PCIe Port configurations for PCIe Controller 3. For further details see Canonlake H / LP Platform Controller Hub EDS.

PCIeContoller4Config.label: PCIe Controller 4 (Port 13-16)
PCIeContoller4Config.help_text: This setting controls PCIe Port configurations for PCIe Controller 4. For further details see Canonlake H / LP Platform Controller Hub EDS.

PCIeContoller5Config.label: PCIe Controller 5 (Port 17-20)
PCIeContoller5Config.help_text: This setting allows the PCIe lanes on Controller 5 to be reversed. For further details see Canonlake / Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS.

PCIeContoller6Config.label: PCIe Controller 6 (Port 21-24)
PCIeContoller6Config.help_text: This setting controls PCIe Port configurations for PCIe Controller 6. For further details see CoffeeLake H Platform Controller Hub EDS.

SataPcieCombo0ModeSel.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 0 Mode Select
SataPcieCombo0ModeSel.help_text: The corresponding CLKREQ# GPIO can only function as DEVSLP# if SATA / PCIe Combo Port 0 is assigned to SATA, and SATA / PCIe Combo Port 0 Mode Select is configured to SATA DEVSLP#.

SataPcieCombo1ModeSel.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 1 Mode Select
SataPcieCombo1ModeSel.help_text: The corresponding CLKREQ# GPIO can only function as DEVSLP# if SATA / PCIe Combo Port 1 is assigned to SATA, and SATA / PCIe Combo Port 1 Mode Select is configured to SATA DEVSLP#.

SataPcieCombo2ModeSel.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 2 Mode Select
SataPcieCombo2ModeSel.help_text: The corresponding CLKREQ# GPIO can only function as DEVSLP# if SATA / PCIe Combo Port 2 is assigned to SATA, and SATA / PCIe Combo Port 2 Mode Select is configured to SATA DEVSLP#.

SataPcieCombo3ModeSel.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 3 Mode Select
SataPcieCombo3ModeSel.help_text: The corresponding CLKREQ# GPIO can only function as DEVSLP# if SATA / PCIe Combo Port 3 is assigned to SATA, and SATA / PCIe Combo Port 3 Mode Select is configured to SATA DEVSLP#.

SataPcieCombo4ModeSel.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 4 Mode Select
SataPcieCombo4ModeSel.help_text: The corresponding CLKREQ# GPIO can only function as DEVSLP# if SATA / PCIe Combo Port 4 is assigned to SATA, and SATA / PCIe Combo Port 4 Mode Select is configured to SATA DEVSLP#.

SataPcieCombo5ModeSel.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 5 Mode Select
SataPcieCombo5ModeSel.help_text: The corresponding CLKREQ# GPIO can only function as DEVSLP# if SATA / PCIe Combo Port 5 is assigned to SATA, and SATA / PCIe Combo Port 5 Mode Select is configured to SATA DEVSLP#.

SataPcieCombo6ModeSel.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 6 Mode Select
SataPcieCombo6ModeSel.help_text: The corresponding CLKREQ# GPIO can only function as DEVSLP# if SATA / PCIe Combo Port 6 is assigned to SATA, and SATA / PCIe Combo Port 6 Mode Select is configured to SATA DEVSLP#.

SataPcieCombo7ModeSel.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 7 Mode Select
SataPcieCombo7ModeSel.help_text: The corresponding CLKREQ# GPIO can only function as DEVSLP# if SATA / PCIe Combo Port 7 is assigned to SATA, and SATA / PCIe Combo Port 7 Mode Select is configured to SATA DEVSLP#.

SataPcieCombo8ModeSel.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 8 Mode Select
SataPcieCombo8ModeSel.help_text: The corresponding CLKREQ# GPIO can only function as DEVSLP# if SATA / PCIe Combo Port 4 is assigned to SATA, and SATA / PCIe Combo Port 8 Mode Select is configured to SATA DEVSLP#.

SataPcieCombo9ModeSel.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 9 Mode Select
SataPcieCombo9ModeSel.help_text: The corresponding CLKREQ# GPIO can only function as DEVSLP# if SATA / PCIe Combo Port 9 is assigned to SATA, and SATA / PCIe Combo Port 9 Mode Select is configured to SATA DEVSLP#.

SataPCIeComboPort0.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 0
SataPCIeComboPort0.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 11 or SATA Port 0. For further details on Flex I/O see Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS.

SataPCIeComboPort1.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 1
SataPCIeComboPort1.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 12 or SATA Port 1. For further details on Flex I/O see Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS.

SataPCIeComboPort2.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 2
SataPCIeComboPort2.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 13 or SATA Port 0. For further details on Flex I/O see Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS.

SataPCIeComboPort3.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 3
SataPCIeComboPort3.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 14 or SATA Port 1. For further details on Flex I/O see Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS.

SataPCIeComboPort4.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 4
SataPCIeComboPort4.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 15 or SATA Port 2. For further details on Flex I/O see Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS.

SataPCIeComboPort5.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 5
SataPCIeComboPort5.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 16 or SATA Port 3. For further details on Flex I/O see Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS.

SataPCIeComboPort6.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 6
SataPCIeComboPort6.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 17 or SATA Port 4. For further details on Flex I/O see Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS.

SataPCIeComboPort7.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 7
SataPCIeComboPort7.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 18 or SATA Port 5. For further details on Flex I/O see Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS.

SataPCIeComboPort8.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 8
SataPCIeComboPort8.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 19 or SATA Port 6. For further details on Flex I/O see Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS. Note: Workstation / Server Only.

SataPCIeComboPort9.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 9
SataPCIeComboPort9.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 20 or SATA Port 7. For further details on Flex I/O see Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS. Note: Workstation / Server Only.

USB3PCIeComboPort0.label: USB3 / PCIe Combo Port 0
USB3PCIeComboPort0.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 1 or USB3 Port 7. For further details on Flex I/O see Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS. Note: This setting will be grayed out if DCI BSSB over USB3 Port7 Enabled is set to 'yes'.

USB3PCIeComboPort1.label: USB3 / PCIe Combo Port 1
USB3PCIeComboPort1.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 2 or USB3 Port 8. For further details on Flex I/O see Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS. Note: This setting will be grayed out if DCI BSSB over USB3 Port8 Enabled is set to 'yes'.

USB3PCIeComboPort2.label: USB3 / PCIe Combo Port 2
USB3PCIeComboPort2.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 3 or USB3 Port 9. For further details on Flex I/O see Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS. Note: This setting will be grayed out if DCI BSSB over USB3 Port9 Enabled is set to 'yes'.

USB3PCIeComboPort3.label: USB3 / PCIe Combo Port 3
USB3PCIeComboPort3.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 4 or USB3 Port 10. For further details on Flex I/O see Coffeelake H Platform Controller Hub EDS. Note: This setting will be grayed out if DCI BSSB over USB3 Port10 Enabled is set to 'yes'.

Touch1MaxFreq.label: Intel(R) Precise Touch and Stylus Controller 1 Maximum Frequency

TchSprdSpecClkEn.label: Touch Spread Spectrum Clock Enabled
